delete.title: Are you sure you want to delete this data?

notePage.notify: No listings have been created yet, Let's create one to continue.

settingPage.title: Settings

theme.name: App theme:
theme.desc: Choose the theme type for the application

defPage.name: Default page:
defPage.desc: Choose the default page to open when the application is started

winPosX.name: window position X:
winPosX.desc: Choose where the window will display horizontally

winPosY.name: window position Y:
winPosY.desc: Choose where the window will display vertically

defAction.name: Default operation:
defAction.desc: Choose the default action to take when the user presses Enter on the input box in the spending page

language.name: Language:
language.desc: Choose the default language to display in the application

optionExit.name: Options on exit:
optionExit.desc: Choose the type of action to take when the application exits

notifyDel.name: Notify When Delete:
notifyDel.desc: Enabling this will display a confirmation message before deleting important data such as spending, lists, etc.

tooltip.name: Tooltip:
tooltip.desc: Enabling this will display legends on the options in the settings page

notification.name: Notification:
notification.desc: Enabling the app to send reminders to add spending if no spending has been added for the day

startWithWindow.name: Start with window:
startWithWindow.desc: Enabling this will allow the application to be started with window

autoUpdate.name: Auto update:
autoUpdate.desc: Enabling this will automatically check and update apps every time it starts

notifyDownload.name: Download notify:
notifyDownload.desc: Enabling this will display a notification before the update downloads

settingPage.dbPath: Change the path to the data directory

button.login_desc: Link to your Google Drive to save and sync app data
button.syncData_desc: Click this button to proceed with data synchronization
button.backupData_desc: Click this button to proceed with data backup

formSyncData.email: Email address associated with Google Drive
formSyncData.desc: The current sync/backup function is still 'EXPERIMENTAL' so errors may occur. Please use the manual data export method below to backup/restore data if necessary.

export.name: Export data files
export.desc: Click this button to export the application's data to an external file

import.name: Import data file
import.desc: Click this button to import data from the backup file into the application

reset.name: Restore settings
reset.desc: Click this button will reset all the app's settings to default

update.name: Check for updates
update.desc: Click this button to check and update the application to the latest version if available

confirmUpdate.title: Detected a new update, do you want to download it?

confirmExit.title1: Do you want to close the application or minimize it to the system tray?.
confirmExit.title2: Minimizing the tray will keep the app running in the background so you can receive notifications.

confirmImport.title1: - Are you sure you want to enter data?, current data on the application will be lost if you enter new data.
confirmImport.title2: - The app will restart automatically after a few seconds to apply the changes when done
